name: Hard "All My Children"--2006 Part 2 Quiz / Test | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following characters was NOT in attendance at Colby Chandler's sweet sixteen party?
questions.explanation:
Petey Courtlandt.

	Colby and Sydney shared their sweet sixteen party together at the yacht club.  Adam threw Colby the sweet sixteen party and Jonathon showed up at the party looking for Lily although he wasn't invited.

questions.text: What country did Aidan go to in order to keep an eye on Terry McDermott?
questions.explanation:
Ireland.

	Aidan followed Terry to Ireland to make sure he wasn't in Pine Valley going after Emma and Lily.  However, he tricked them and came back.

questions.text: Which teen musical star performed at Colby Chandler's sweet sixteen birthday party?
questions.explanation:
Jesse McCartney.

	Jesse McCartney sang at Colby's party.  Ironically, he played J.R. Chandler on "All My Children" from 1998 to 2001.

questions.text: Who admitted to planting the disc with Greg Madden's final hours for J.R. to find?
questions.explanation:
Ryan.

	Ryan found the disc in Zack's closet.  He then planted it so that J.R. would find it and throw the scent off of Zack as a suspect in Greg Madden's murder.

questions.text: Who admitted to killing Greg Madden?
questions.explanation:
Tad.

	Tad lied in court so that the jury would not convict Dixie and Zack of killing Dr. Madden.  Tad then told Dixie everything that happened with Dr. Madden and why he lied to protect her.

questions.text: What was the name of Annie's ex-husband who was a sexual predator?
questions.explanation:
Terry.

	Terry McDermott prayed upon Lily Montgomery Lavery before he was eventually shot and killed by Jonathon Lavery.

questions.text: Who are the biological parents of Josh Madden?
questions.explanation:
Jeff Martin and Erica Kane.

	When Jeff and Erica were married she became pregnant. Erica then went to have an abortion but her fetus was stolen and placed in Dr. Greg Madden's wife and raised as their son.

questions.text: Jonathon fought off Amanda's advances for an affair because of his love for Lily.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Jonathon decided that he needed a friend with benefits and Amanda was more than willing to help him out.

questions.text: What was the date that Dr. Greg Madden disappeared?
questions.explanation:
June 5th.

	Greg Madden was caught trying to leave town and buried alive in a coffin in the park.  There was a small earthquake on July 4th that made the coffin cave in and suffocated Greg Madden to death.

questions.text: Which of the following characters got his medical license reinstated?
questions.explanation:
David Hayward.

	Dr. Hayward got his license reinstated after he saved Palmer Courtland's life following the explosion at the Mardi Gras Ball.  Vincent Irizarry who has played Dr. David Hayward since 1997 has been let out of his contract and will be leaving the show by the end of 2006.
